reviewText: Though he starts out as this hot shot conceited gangster that leaves me thinking, "dork", by the end of the movie he is someone who is not only likable, but nice to look at. Some clever ideas in the story. The action is entertaining and I enjoyed the twist at the end. If I were in the market to collect films starring Shahrukh Khan, I'd probably add this one, even if it does seem like the actor is showing off.
